# sakura_iam_id_role (Data Source)

Get information about an existing IAM ID Role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_iam_id_role" "foobar" {
  id = "identity-admin"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the IAM ID Role.
- `name` (String) The name of the IAM ID Role.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the IAM ID Role.
